Package de.dosmike.sponge.megamenus.api.listener

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OnChangeListener<V,X extends IValueChangeable>
    This is a MegaMenus API event called, when a Changeable Element was interacted with.
    Copy of method description:
    You can get the menu instance and states via the element parameter
    param oldValue - the previous value for this element
    param newValue - the value the element now holds
    param element - the element that was clicked itself
    param viewer - the player that clicked the element
    OnClickListener<X extends IClickable>
    Listener that triggers when a player clicks an IClickable menu element
    Copy of method description:
    You can get the menu instance and states via the element parameter
    param element - the element that was clicked
    param player - the player that clicked the element
    param button - the index of the mouse button used, one of MouseEvent.NOBUTTON, MouseEvent.BUTTON1, MouseEvent.BUTTON2 or MouseEvent.BUTTON3
    param sift - true if shift was held during this click.
    OnKeyListener<X extends IPressable>
    Listener that triggers when a player one of a limited set of buttons while hovering over a IPressable menu element
    Copy of method description:
    You can get the menu instance and states via the element parameter
    param element - the element that was clicked
    param player - the player that clicked the element
    param key - A limited set of available buttons that can actually be detected, see IPressable.Buttons param sift - true if shift was held and detectable during this key press.
    OnRenderStateListener
    All methods have an empty default body so that implementations don't need to provide all unused methods as well.
    OnSlotChangeListener<X extends IInventory>
    Triggered when a player interacts with IInventory menu elements
    Copy of method description:
    Event specifically for tracking changes in MSlot elements.
    param change - a wrapper for the SlotTransaction that triggered this event
    param element - the element that was interacted with
    param viewer - the player that took or put items from/into this element
